name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Mahjong Hokan Keikaku
overview: Shinseiki Evangelion: Mahjong Hokan Keikaku is a mahjong spin-off game of the Neon Genesis Evangelion anime series. The game is a simple mahjong sim using digitized screenshots from the anime as backdrops. The music is 8-bit renditions of tracks from the series. The game's publisher, King Records, had a hand in the release of CD's featuring music from the series.
